name: triple lucy pendant | PP03
description: WHY YOU LOVE IT: Three little geometric structures on a chain - perfect daily necklace for the polygon lover! Sweet momento for things that come in threes, like kiddos, anniversaries, etc. THE STORY: This came out of a special request by a mom; she loved the double lucy pendant, but had three kids and wanted a little polygon for each. The littlest girl exclaimed, "I want to be the gold one!" - and how can you say no to that? Ergo, the "triple lucy" was happily born. THE DETAILS: • Sterling silver, 18k vermeil • Each element is 1/4" diameter • Available on a 16 or 18" chain •Always email us with any questions about availability - orders may be filled from limited stock on-hand!
